title: Quick And Simple Hydroponic Tomato Setup!  #hydroponics #tomato #indoorgardening

tasks.task: Setting up a plant in a net cup
subtasks: Ensure a few roots are coming through the net cup bottom
Arrange clay balls around the plant in the net cup
Use clay balls to provide stability to the plant
Utilize clay balls to prevent light from reaching the nutrient water
